content: make a super cute set of crochet mushrooms to decorate your favorite spaces with this free pattern for this pattern you will need -worsted weight yarn size 4 -polyester fiber fill -3 75mm crochet hook -yarn needle -scissors -stitch markers abbreviations magic_ring- magic_ring st- stitch single_crochet- single_crochet increase- increase single_crochet twice in one stitch decrease- decrease single_crochet two stitches together fo- finish off blo- back loops only
